hero.title: A Friend Awaits You
hero.text: Every dog or cat deserves a second chance. By adopting, you turn a broken past into a future of love and loyalty. Open your heart, and your home becomes their safe haven.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.text: Our shelter exists to protect, care for, and give hope to abandoned animals. Discover our mission, values, and the inspiring stories that motivate us every day to continue making a difference in their lives.

hero.title: Be Part of the Change
hero.text: Your support can take many forms: a little time to help, a donation to feed, or simply sharing to raise awareness. Together, every small gesture builds a brighter tomorrow for them.

card_1.alt: Explore our adoption options for dogs and cats, and give them the chance to live in a safe, loving, forever home.

card_2.title: Adoption
card_2.content: Learn how you can transform the life of a loyal companion by opening your heart and welcoming them into your family home.

card_3.alt: Support the shelter with your generous donations, helping us provide food, medical care, safety, and love for every rescued animal here.

card_4.title: Donations
card_4.content: Discover how your contribution, whether small or large, can truly change animals’ lives and support our mission in a lasting way.

card_5.alt: Join our team as a volunteer, walk our dogs, share affection, and give them unforgettable moments of freedom, joy, and happiness.

card_6.title: Dog Walking
card_6.content: Check available schedules and join us to participate in dog walking, bringing well-being, joy, and socialization to every dog we shelter.

campaignSection.title: Don't abandon them, help them find a home
campaignSection.text: Every animal deserves love and care. Before deciding to abandon, consider alternatives like adoption or temporary shelter. Your action can save their life and give them a happy future.
campaignSection.imageAlt: Puppy being left alone on the street

volunteerSection.title: Become a Volunteer
volunteerSection.introPhrase: Our time, our hands, and our hearts can change lives.
captions: Teach and learn about animal care
Your donation fills bellies and hearts
Vaccinating is also an act of love

form.title: Sign up here!
form.description: Signing up is easy: fill out the form and we’ll get in touch. WhatsApp is optional but makes communication faster. Helping doesn’t always mean adopting; you can also give time and affection.
form.name: Your name

title: Your time changes lives
They need love too
Building communities
description: Giving a few hours can change everything. Every walk, every touch, every act of love brings hope back to those who need it most. Your time has the power to transform lives.
Animals feel, wait, and trust. A little attention and kindness can heal invisible wounds and fill their world with joy. To love is also to save.
Being a volunteer not only helps animals, it connects people. Together we build a space of empathy, respect, and hope, where every action sparks real and lasting change.

donationSection.title: Donate & Make a Difference
donationSection.description: Your support helps save abused and abandoned animals. Together, we can give them safe homes, feed the hungry, and heal their wounds. Thank you for your love.
donationSection.donationIntro: Your support helps save abused and abandoned animals. Together, we can give them safe homes, feed the hungry, and heal their wounds. Thank you for your love.
donationSection.whyDonateDescription: Donations are what make our mission possible. Every contribution allows us to cover medical treatments, food, and safe shelter for the animals we rescue. Together, we can change their story.

donationCards.title: Ways to Donate
description: Donate directly through our bank account. Safe and quick.

You can also donate from abroad using our SWIFT code.
